name: __ELifetimeCondition
doc: Secondary condition to check before considering the replication of a lifetime property.

COND_InitialOnly: This property has no condition, and will send anytime it changes
COND_OwnerOnly: This property will only attempt to send on the initial bunch
COND_SkipOwner: This property will only send to the actor's owner
COND_SimulatedOnly: This property send to every connection EXCEPT the owner
COND_AutonomousOnly: This property will only send to simulated actors
COND_SimulatedOrPhysics: This property will only send to autonomous actors
COND_InitialOrOwner: This property will send to simulated OR bRepPhysics actors
COND_Custom: This property will send on the initial packet, or to the actors owner
COND_ReplayOrOwner: This property has no particular condition, but wants the ability to toggle on/off via SetCustomIsActiveOverride
COND_ReplayOnly: This property will only send to the replay connection, or to the actors owner
COND_SimulatedOnlyNoReplay: This property will only send to the replay connection
COND_SimulatedOrPhysicsNoReplay: This property will send to actors only, but not to replay connections
COND_SkipReplay: This property will send to simulated Or bRepPhysics actors, but not to replay connections
COND_Dynamic: This property will not send to the replay connection
COND_Never: This property wants to override the condition at runtime. Defaults to always replicate until you override it to a new condition.
COND_NetGroup: This property will never be replicated
COND_MAX: This subobject will replicate to connections that are part of the same group the subobject is registered to. Not usable on properties.
